item.title: otm
item.description: just heard the latest episode of on the media. this is a super helpful guide i found on their twitter.

item.title: hey dere bub!
item.description:
if you haven’t checked it out yet, give my new podcast a listen!
episode 5 was uploaded today. we’re on twitter, facebook, and of course our own website give us a shout on twitter or shoot us an email and let us know what you thought and if there is anything you’d like us to talk about in the future.
